mapper.select: SELECT a.*, e.writer_id FROM answer a JOIN enquiry e on a.enquiry_no = e.enquiry_no WHERE answer_no = #{answerNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE answer SET answer_hits = (answer_hits + 1) WHERE answer_no = #{answerNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO answer(enquiry_no, answer_title, answer_content, a_writer_id, a_writer_name) VALUES (#{enquiryNo}, #{answerTitle}, #{answerContent}, #{aWriterId}, #{aWriterName})
